data.eml:eml: Description of two new species of Hypselotropis Jekel with a revised key and phylogenetic reanalysis of the genus (Coleoptera, Anthribidae, Anthribinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mermudes, Jose Ricardo M., Rodrigues, Juliana Mourão Dos Santos (2010): Description of two new species of Hypselotropis Jekel with a revised key and phylogenetic reanalysis of the genus (Coleoptera, Anthribidae, Anthribinae). Zootaxa 2575: 49-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197472
